channel.title: Neopets money tree grabber (New and Improved) (Scar)
channel.description:
Ok, new and improved.
[code]Procedure loop; begin ClickMouse(630, 242, True); wait (2000) ClickMouse(575, 561, True); wait (2000) ClickMouse(661, 646, True); wait (2000) end;
begin repeat loop; until (false) end.[/code]
Thats easier, huh? lol. i just learned repeats. This script clicks on shops, money tree, then on an item. Overnight, it got me 46 items.
On the first "Clickmouse", erase the coordinates and insert the one's that your "shops" is on. same with the second and 3rd, with "money tree" and an item.
it might work as is, but just in case, ya know?
Good luck and happy cheating.

item.title: Neopets money tree grabber (New and Improved) (Scar)
item.dc:creator: @johnnyboy2 johnnyboy2
item.description:
@johnnyboy2 wrote:

Ok, new and improved.

[code]Procedure loop;
begin
ClickMouse(630, 242, True);
wait (2000)
ClickMouse(575, 561, True);
wait (2000)
ClickMouse(661, 646, True);
wait (2000)
end;

begin
repeat
loop;
until (false)
end.[/code]

Thats easier, huh? lol. i just learned repeats.
This script clicks on shops, money tree, then on an item. Overnight, it got me 46 items.

On the first “Clickmouse”, erase the coordinates and insert the one’s that your “shops” is on.
same with the second and 3rd, with “money tree” and an item.

it might work as is, but just in case, ya know?

Good luck and happy cheating.
